title: Genki Sushi
typeOfFood: Ovo, Japanese, Buffet, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Kaiten (conveyor belt) sushi chain restaurant. Has a few vegetable sushi rolls, plus edamame, salad, and tofu. Busy at lunch at dinner time. Staff understands when you tell them you are a vegan and will guide you in ordering. Can make 3 types of sushi (2 of which are not on the menu), inari, a seaweed noodle salad, two types of vegetable tempura dishes, and the deep fried tofu dish (also edamame).
